content: {"name": "McDevitt Recreation Ctr", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.phila.gov/programs/playstreets/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3501 Scotts Lane", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19129", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.00642780033748, "longitude": -75.18810920042178}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 685-2197", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}]}
